column4: anyone has a xorg.conf with a dual screen using the "radeon" driver setup.. i've got a ati 9200 mobility (or rv250 ? i don't understand that) and i think "ati" driver don't support my card, and fglrx neither. anyone can steer me in the right way ?
9200 does not support fglrx, only aiglx...  see xinerama or twinview
if i got my screens working properly (clone screen) i could simple add option aiglx true, option xinerama true and it should work ?
